thread.section_title: the Quin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful Hotel - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 10trips
title: Wonderful Hotel
text: The staff at the Quin is very professional, accommodating and pleasant. Our room was very spacious for New York standards and the DUX bed is incredible, fantastic night sleep. Additional they were able to accommodated for my hyper allogenic bedding needs. I also love the fact that they had gluten-free options on thier room service menu. And the location of this hotel is perfect because it's a short walk to Central Park and MOMA.
